name: Extreme Off Road Bus Driver 3d Simulator 2017
name_original: Extreme Off Road Bus Driver 3d Simulator 2017
description:
Have you ever experienced to drive bus on off road hilly areas? NO? Then get ready to experience the most thrilling and adventurous off road bus driving experience in dangerous uphills and downhill mountainous areas.
So, let’s play the most realistic tourist transporter bus game. Extreme offroad bus simulator 2017 is full of excitement and adventurous game to pick up and drop passengers to their destinations by crossing zig zag roads of extreme hilly areas. Get the real feel of nature with realistic off road bus driving on hills and mountain peaks. Play as the extreme hill bus driver to fulfill the duty of passenger transportation. Tourists always need safe and fast transport service, so be the energetic bus driver in your transportation duty. Extreme off road real bus driver 3d simulator game is adventurous and craziest off road bus driving with real-time physics, hill top driving, twisted turns and breathtaking gameplay scenes.
Playing Extreme off road real bus driver 3d simulator game gives you many hours of nonstop bus gaming fun! Each game play scene has its own off-road simulator 4x4 challenge. Playing hill speed driving games have never been this much fun ever. So get in your passenger bus to experience the best bus simulator game feeling ever. Playing the awesome game levels require a unique combination of precision driving skills and cautious hill speed driving.
**Features of Extreme off road real bus simulator 2017**
• Adventurous & exciting multiple challenging levels.
• Animated Tourist Passengers.
• Awesome Gigantic Buses with Realistic Vehicle Physics
• Intelligent Traffic system.
• 3 different real transport buses
• Extreme off road stunts
• Free and carrier mode
• HD and Amazing 3D Graphics
• Day Mode gameplay
• Realistic controls over the offroad environment
• Easy and free to use
• Offline Game Play
• Amazing camera view to deliver you realistic bus driving experience
• Explore the beautiful open world hilly and mountainous environment

So!! What are you waiting for? Download it now for extreme offroad driving experience, and master the skills of driving long vehicles over the curvy roads of hilly areas.
